price: Ɛda a wͻbɛhunu Soro abͻfoͻ no, saa da no εnyε asεmpa mma abͻneεfoͻ no. (Soro abͻfoͻ no) bεka sε: “Moma εhyeε kεseԑ nna (wͻn ne Soro Aheman mu foͻ no ntεm)“
arabic: يَوۡمَ يَرَوۡنَ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ لَا بُشۡرَىٰ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ وَيَقُولُونَ حِجۡرٗا مَّحۡجُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: yawma yarawna al-malāikata lā bush'rā yawma-idhin lil'muj'rimīna wayaqūlūna ḥij'ran maḥjūran
